name: Pecan Pie Tarts
author: Ruth
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease 30 tart tins or muffin cups and set aside
To Make Crust: In a medium mixing bowl cream together cream cheese and 1 cup butter until light and fluffy
Blend in flour, 1/2 cup at a time, forming a smooth dough
Roll into 30 equal balls and press one into each greased tin so it lines the bottom and sides, like a pie crust
To Make Filling: In a medium mixing bowl cream together 1/4 cup butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla until thoroughly blended
Fill each lined tin half full
Mixture will rise as it bakes
Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until lightly browned
Let cool in tins, then use the end of a table knife to flip each tart out of its tin
